title: Twin
lyrics:
(A-ha ha!)
[Verse 1]
Your warmth, your warmth is so deep
Your gaze beams a hole into me
[Chorus 1]
Controlling again
Unseparated twins
Controlling again
[Verse 2]
You've sucked all the breath out of me
You'll squeeze all the life out of me
[Chorus 1]
Controlling again
Unseparated twins
Controlling again
[Chorus 2]
Controlling again
Unseparated twins
You might have been
[Outro]
Come gentle, slowly
Down tonight
